S08n688:1: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
S08n688:5: sarvabodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ śrāvakasaṅghapuraskṛtaḥ sarvadevanāgayakṣagaruḍagandharvakinnaramahoragasiddhavidyādharaḥ mānuṣāmānuṣaiḥ parivṛto vihare'haṃ veditavyaḥ |
S08n688:8: yatra sthāno'yaṃ dharmakośastathāgatānāṃ pustakagato vā likhyati vācayiṣyati dhārayiṣyati satkṛtya manasikṛtya vividhaiścāmaraṇapūrṇacchatradhvajapatākāghaṇṭābhirvādyamālyavilepanairdhūpagandhaiśca sugandhibhiḥ pūjayiṣyati mānayiṣyati satkariṣyati ekāgramanaso vā cittaṃ dhatse |
S08n688:14: na cāsya tatrānāvṛṣṭibhayaṃ bhavati ativṛṣṭibhayo vā |
S08n688:15: na cāsya tatra mahāvātamaṇḍalībhayaṃ bhavati sarvakravyādabhayo vā |
S08n688:16: na cāsya śakrabhayaṃ bhavati sarvadhūrttataskarabhayo vā |
S08n688:23: na cāsya rogabhayaṃ bhavati jvarātīsārajīrṇāṅgapratyaṅgabhayo vā |
S08n688:27: guhyatamo'yaṃ dharmakośastathāgatānāṃ mantrānuvartanatayā punareṣāṃ sarvataḥ ācāryasamayānupraviṣṭānām |
S08n688:38: guhyanivaraṇa- sattvopaghātananṛpatisūcana āyuḥpramāṇopaghātopasargikakriyāṃ kariṣyantīti na pareṣāmārocayitavyaṃ ca |
S08n688:39: samayarahasyaguhyamantracaryānupraviṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgataśāsanaśikṣāyā suśikṣitānāṃ suvyavasthitānāṃ dharmārthakovidāmāyatanadhātusamayānupraveśadharmasthitānāṃ satyasandhānāṃ dṛḍhavratamanvāgatānāṃ sattvacaryāmārgānupraviṣṭakāruṇikānāmeteṣāṃ sattvānāmārocayitavyam;
S08n688:41: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bodhisattvotthāyāsanādekāṃśamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā,
S08n688:54: na paśyase paraṃ guhyametaṃ dharmavaraṃ varam |
S08n688:59: na bhūtaṃ vidyate kaścid yaḥ kalpavisarādiha ||
S08n688:61: prāpnuyāt puṣkalāṃ kīrttiṃ divyāṃ mānuṣikāṃ tathā ||
S08n688:64: idaṃ sūtraṃ dhāraṇāt puṇya anuśaṃsā syādime tathā |
S08n688:65: na cāsya sarvakāye vai na viṣaṃ na hutāśanam ||
S08n688:66: na vetāḍā grahāścaiva na pūtanā mātarā hi ye |
S08n688:68: piśācā vāsya hiṃsyeyuḥ yasta sūtramimaṃ paṭhet |
S08n688:69: dhārayedvāpi pūjayed vā na punaḥ punaḥ vividhā ||
S08n688:70: vādya pūjya pūja iṣu pūjayed vā viśaradaḥ |
S08n688:72: āturo mucyate rogān duḥkhito sukhino bhavet |
S08n688:73: daridro labhate arthān baddho mucyeta bandhanāt ||
S08n688:75: kṣemaṃ śivaṃ ca nirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyādacalaṃ padam ||
S08n688:79: pūjitvā labhate puṇyaṃ tatsarvamidaṃ sūtraṃ paṭhanādiha ||
S08n688:90: tatpramāṇād bhavet sarve teṣāṃ pūjāṃ tathaiva ca |
S08n688:91: tat puṇyaṃ prāpnuyānmartya yasya pustaka gataṃ kare ||
S08n688:94: teṣāṃ ca pūjā satkṛtya kaści jantu punaḥ punaḥ |
S08n688:96: na śakyaṃ kalpakoṭyaiste ratnai jinavaraiḥ sadā |
S08n688:101: akhinnamanaso bhūtvā yo imāṃ sādhayet bhuvi ||
S08n688:106: yo'smān kalvavarā hyekaṃ mantraṃ dhāraye nṛpa |
S08n688:109: na cāsya hanyate śastrairna viṣaiḥ sthāvarajaṅgamaiḥ ||
S08n688:113: kāyaṃ na hanyate tasya nṛpatervā jantuno'pi vā ||
S08n688:114: ya imaṃ sūtravarāgraṃ tu dhārayed vācayet tathā |
S08n688:115: rājā ca kṛtayā mūrdhnāṃ saṅgrāme samupasthite ||
S08n688:116: chatraṃ śirasi māvedya namaskuryāt punaḥ punaḥ |
S08n688:120: dṛṣṭvā taṃ vidviṣaḥ sarve nivartanteyuste pare janāḥ |
S08n688:125: yudhi prāptaṃ samastaṃ vai tasmiṃ kāle'vatārayet ||
S08n688:126: naśyante dṛṣṭamātraṃ vai muhyante vā samantataḥ |
S08n688:141: kathitaṃ dharmakośaṃ tu mānuṣā tu bhūtale ||
S08n688:145: muniśreṣṭhe tadā pṛcchet kāśyapaṃ taṃ jinottamam ||
S08n688:158: tataste nu smarto se smṛta tattvagato tataḥ |
S08n688:160: yatra sau bhagavāṃ tasthuḥ maghavāṃścaiva sureśvara |
S08n688:161: āgatā bhāṣate mantrāṃ vanditvā jinavaraṃ tadā ||
S08n688:162: praṇamya jinavarāṃ sarvāṃ kāśyapaṃ ca mahādyutim |
S08n688:165: om hana hana sarvabhayān sādayotsādaya trāsaya moṭaya chinda bhinda jvala jvala hu hu phaṭ phaṭ svāhā |
S08n688:166: samanantarabhāṣiteyaṃ mantrā kumārabhūtena mañjuśriyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena |
S08n688:168: sarvāṃśca buddhāṃ bhagavatāṃ kṣetrānantāparyantā salokadhātudiśaparyantāṃ sarvaiśca buddhairbhagavadbhiradhiṣṭhitāni ca imāni mantrapadāni ||
S08n688:169: atha śakro devānāmindraḥ vigatabhayaromakarṣaḥ āścaryādbhutaprāptaḥ utphullanayanaḥ utthāyāsanād bhagavataḥ pādayornipatya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ca mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ sammukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tāni ca mantrapadāṃ gṛhya manasīkṛtya ca punareva syandanamadhiruhya yena te'surāḥ prādravitaḥ sarve'surā yena pātālaṃ mahāsamudrāśrayādharapuraṃ svakaṃ tenābhimukhāḥ prayayuḥ |
S08n688:170: hatavidhvastamānasaḥ sainyabhayākulitavihvalaniṣaṇṇavadanadarpaḥ vigataśastrā dṛṣṭā taṃ sureśvaraṃ jvalantamiva pāvakaṃ nirvartya svālayaṃ gatā abhūt ||
S08n688:171: atha śakro devānāmindraḥ devāṃ trāyastriṃśānāmantrayate sma |
S08n688:174: āgacchantu bhavantaḥ krīḍatha ramatha paricārayatha svaṃ svaṃ bhavanavaraṃ gatvā |
S08n688:175: svālayaṃ cetaste devā hṛṣṭamanasaḥ punareva nivartya svālayaṃ gatā ||
S08n688:177: ‘yanvahaṃ taṃ kumārarūpiṇaṃ bimbākāraṃ kṛtvā dhvajāgre sthāpayeyaṃ,
S08n688:179: atha śakro devānāmindraḥ mahatā maṇiratnadyotigarbhaprabhodyotanaṃ nāma gṛhītvā kumārākārapratibimbaṃ kārayitvā upari prāsādasya mūrdhani sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ sudarśanasya mahānagarasya madhye taṃ dhvajocchritasuvinyastaṃ kṛtvā sthāpayāmāsa ||
S08n688:180: tataste asurā prahrādavemacitriprabhṛtayaḥ pātālaṃ nordhvagacchati na ca tāṃ devānabhidravante na ca śekuḥ ṛddhivikurvāṇaṃ raṇābhimukhaṃ vā gantum |
S08n688:185: aparimāṇaṃ yā puṇyaprasavanaṃ mahānarakopapattitiryakpretayamalokajanmakutsanatāmupaiti yo imaṃ dharmaparyāyamapavadate vikalpeta vā kramati grastacitto vā va vadeyuḥ na buddhavacaneti vā vadeyuḥ na mantrā na cauṣadhayo bodhisattvānāṃ pi teṣāṃ māhātmyavistaramṛddhivikurvaṇaṃ vā nāpi vikalpavistaramanāryairbhāṣitamiti kṛtvā utsṛjya tyajante avagacchanti na śaknuvanti vā śrotum;
S08n688:187: ye narā mūḍhacitto vai pratikṣepsyanti varamimam |
S08n688:194: gacchate janā tatra ye narā dharmadūṣakāḥ ||
S08n688:197: pacyante te janāstasmin yo dharmaṃ lopayedimam |
S08n688:223: yo hīhimaṃ sūtravaraṃ mukhyaṃ dharmakośaṃ jinorjitam |
S08n688:224: pratikṣeptāro bhuvi martyāṃ vā avīcau narakāntakau ||
S08n688:226: yadā kāle tu martyāḥ kadācit karhacid bhavet ||
S08n688:229: durgandho'tha bībhatsa vyaṅgo andha eva saḥ |
S08n688:230: bhīmarūpī sadārūpī sadārūkṣaḥ preta va dṛśyate bhuvi ||
S08n688:240: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃśamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ utphullanayanaḥ animiṣanayanaḥ sarvāṃstāṃ śuddhāvāsabhavanastān devaputrānanekāṃśca bhūtasaṅghāṃ sannipatritāṃ dharmaśravaṇāya viditvaivaṃ śākyamuniṃ bhagavantametamāhuḥ -
S08n688:242: tad bhagavaṃ ! bhaviṣyatyanāgate'dhvani sattvā viṣamalobhābhībhūtāḥ sattvāḥ pañcakaṣāyodriktamanaso'śrāddhāḥ kuhakāḥ khaṭukāḥ kuśīlāḥ te mantrāṇāṃ gatimāhātmyapūjita kāladeśaniyamaṃ mantracaryāhomajapaniyamakalpaviśarāṃ na śraddhāsyanti |
S08n688:245: te duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayiṣyanti |
S08n688:247: teṣāṃ bhagavaṃ ! duḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāṃ kathaṃ pratipattavyam ! mahākāruṇikāśca buddhā bhagavantaḥ ||”
S08n688:248: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamunirmañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ mūrdhni parāmṛśyāmantrayate sma - “sādhu sādhu khalu punastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ ! yastvaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthe hitāya pratipannaḥ |
S08n688:249: sādhu punastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ ! yastvaṃ tathāgatametamarthaṃ praśnasi |
S08n688:251: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru |
S08n688:252: bhāṣiṣye'haṃ te sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya lokānukampāyai devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca sarvamantracaryānupraviṣṭabodhimārganiyuñjānadharmadhātuparamūrtyopāśrayalilipsūnāṃ maraṇakālasamaye ca smarttavyo'yaṃ vidyārājā paramarahasyaṃ kumāra ! tvadīyamūlakalpapaṭalavisara katamaṃ ca tat ||
S08n688:255: lahu lahu bhrūṃ bhrūṃ hū hū jinajit mañjuśrīya suśriya tāraya māṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ phaṭ phaṭ śamaya śamaya |
S08n688:257: eṣa mañjuśrīḥ tvadīyaṃ paramahṛdaya sarvaśāntikaraṃ sarvapāpakṣayaṃ sarvaduḥkhapramocanamāyurārogyaiśvaryaparamasaubhāgyavākyasañjananaṃ sarvavidyārājasattejanaṃ ca samanantarabhāṣite śākyamuninā buddhena bhagavatā |
S08n688:261: na ca tasmin samaye saddharmapratikṣepeṇa cittaṃ bhaveyuḥ |
S08n688:262: na ca mārā pāpīyāṃsaḥ avatāraṃ lapsante |
S08n688:265: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ acintyabuddhā bodhidharmā cintayituṃ vā pratikṣeptuṃ vā buddhā bhagavanto jñāsyantīti ||
S08n688:266: āryamañjuśrīmūlakalpād bodhisattvapiṭakāvaṃtaṃsakāt mahāyānavaipulyasūtrāt pañcāśatimaḥ anuśaṃsāvigarhaṇaprabhāvapaṭalavisaraḥ parisamāpta iti |
